timeline.message:
GEODE-8651: MsgReader's readHeader and readMessage should be synchronized

    Co-authored-by: Anil <agingade@pivotal.io>
    Co-authored-by: Darrel Schneider <darrel@vmware.com>
    Co-authored-by: Bill Burcham <bill.burcham@gmail.com>
    Co-authored-by: Ernie Burghardt <eburghardt@pivotal.io>

timeline.bodyText: I don't like that we verify that getConduit is called 1 time. I understand after looking at the code but it seems rather indirect logically and brittle. I would prefer that you extract the block of code in notifyHandshakeWaiter starting at line 810 into a method named "clearSSLInputBuffer". Then this test can assert that clearSSLInputBuffer is only called 1 time. This would be much clearer and less brittle and would not increase the diffs much
timeline.author: dschneider-pivotal
